You are encouraged to send me your CV and transcripts to: kail@clemson.edu CVKai LiuKai Liu is an Assistant Professor in Computer Science Division, Clemson University. He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from Colorado School of Mines working with Dr. Hua Wang. His main research interest lies in Machine Learning, Optimization, Computational Linear Algebra and Deep Learning Efficiency. He aims to develop Robust, Efficient and Scalable data-driven machine/deep learning algorithms with theoretical guarantee. Selected PublicationsHossein Esfahani, Kai Liu, Javad Velni.
